snippet: Sandra Ávila Beltrán, the first woman to be charged as the leader of an international drug-smuggling operation, faces cocaine-smuggling charges filed in a United States District Court in Florida.
abstract: Accused Mexican drug trafficker Sandra Avila Beltran is extradited to the United States to face cocaine-smuggling charges; she is the first woman to be charged as a leader of an international drug-smuggling operation.
lead_paragraph: Sandra Ávila Beltrán, the first woman to be charged as the leader of an international drug-smuggling operation, faces cocaine-smuggling charges filed in a United States District Court in Florida.

headline.main: Mexico: Drug Suspect Extradited to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Drug Suspect Extradited to U.S.
